struct.name: RealmInfo
struct.doc: Information how this device is represented in the realm on the SMS.

member.name: realmId
member.doc: The ID of the realm on the SMS.

member.name: deviceId
member.doc: The ID of the device on the SMS.

member.name: userId
member.doc: The ID of the user on the SMS.

struct.name: DeviceInfo
struct.doc: Basic device info published by any Qeo-enabled device. On Android, the Qeo Service will handle the job of publishing this information.

member.name: deviceId
member.doc: The device identification generated by Qeo.

member.name: manufacturer
member.doc: The manufacturer of the device (human readable string).

member.name: modelName
member.doc: Model name of the device (human readable string).

member.name: productClass
member.doc: Identifier of the class of product for which the serial number applies. That is, for a given manufacturer, this parameter is used to identify the product or class of product over which the SerialNumber parameter is unique. This value MUST remain fixed over the lifetime of the device, including across firmware updates.

member.name: serialNumber
member.doc: Identifier of the particular device that is unique for the indicated class of product and manufacturer. This value MUST remain fixed over the lifetime of the device, including across firmware updates.

member.name: hardwareVersion
member.doc: A string identifying the particular CPE model and version.

member.name: softwareVersion
member.doc: A string identifying the software version currently installed in the device (i.e. version of the overall device firmware). To allow version comparisons, this element SHOULD be in the form of dot-delimited integers, where each successive integer represents a more minor category of variation. For example, 3.0.21 where the components mean: Major.Minor.Build.

member.name: configURL
member.doc: URL for configuration page that allows to view and/or configure device settings.
